text: The Man and the Moment is a 1918 British silent drama film directed by Arrigo Bocchi and starring Manora Thew, Hayford Hobbs and Charles Vane.Low p.192 It is an adaptation of the novel of the same name by Elinor Glyn. == Plot Synopsis == An American heiress marries a Scottish aristocrat. She leaves him and goes to Italy, but later returns. ==Cast== * Manora Thew as Sabine Delburg * Hayford Hobbs as Lord Michael Arranstoun * Charles Vane as Lord Henry Fordyce * Maud Cressall as Princess Morava * Peggy Carlisle as Miss Van der Water * Jeff Barlow as Armstrong * Kenelm Foss as Prince Torniloni ==See also== *Mad Hour (1928) *The Man and the Moment (1929) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael.
